About Big Bob Gibson Bar-B-Q Big Bob Gibson Bar-B-Q is a Fast Food restaurant located at 1715 6th Ave Se in Decatur, AL . Big Bob Gibson Bar-B-Q has been described as an Great Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 8 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Take Out, Catering Services Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Big Bob Gibson Bar-B-Q
All Reviews for Big Bob Gibson Bar-B-Q
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
8
Decor
8
Service
8
I love BBQ and I love brisket. Famous Dave's does them both well. The place is neat too. The waitstaff is typically attentive. It's also a bit pricey so expect at least $12-15 a head. Overall: I think it's worth eating there because the food is dynamite with a lot of choices in BBQ sauce - order the Devil's Spit.
Overall Rating
8
"Great"
